name: **Illaunmore – _An tOileán Mór_**
description: Illaunmore – An tOileán Mór L896-350 Sheet 44 An attractive, low island connected at its eastern point to the mainland at LW. In 2006, one house was inhabited full time, and another mostly. There are many abandoned ruins and deserted houses. Being grazed to some extent, there isn’t the same feel of neglect as elsewhere. It is a popular venue with summer tourists for ‘camping sauvage’ in the fields.
